word: THE WORK IS TO BE DONE. IT SHOULD BE DONE NOW. YOU SHOULD VOLUNTEER TO ENTER THIS FIELD. BEFORE VERY LONG THE LAST OPPORTUNITY WILL HAVE BEEN GIVEN SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTISTS TO DO THIS WORK. GOD WILL THEN TURN TO MEN IN THE BYWAYS AND HEDGES, AND WE IDLE SEVENTH DAY ADVENTISTS WILL BE PASSED BY FOREVER.
